CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1963 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1963 Code, as supplemented through 1983, which are included herein. Sections of the 1963 Code as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete, or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
Section Section
this Code
